articles.title: EU plans to cap Russian gas price as Putin warns West of winter freeze - Reuters
articles.description: The European Union proposed a price cap on Russian gas on Wednesday after President Vladimir Putin threatened to cut off all energy supplies if it took such a step, raising the risk of rationing in some of the world's richest countries this winter.
